attractions.name: City Park
attractions.description: Our beautiful 50-acre city park features walking trails, playgrounds, picnic areas, and a scenic lake perfect for family outings and relaxation.

attractions.name: Downtown Plaza
attractions.description: The heart of our city with shops, restaurants, and frequent community events including concerts and farmers markets.

attractions.name: Historical Museum
attractions.description: Explore our city's rich history through interactive exhibits and artifacts dating back to the 1800s.

attractions.name: Riverwalk Trail
attractions.description: A 5-mile paved trail along the river perfect for walking, running, and biking with beautiful views.

attractions.name: Science Center
attractions.description: Interactive science exhibits and planetarium shows that make learning fun for all ages.

attractions.name: Botanical Gardens
attractions.description: Stunning gardens featuring native plants, exotic flowers, and themed gardens across 30 acres.

attractions.name: Performing Arts Center
attractions.description: Hosting Broadway shows, symphony performances, and local theater productions throughout the year.

attractions.name: Sports Complex
attractions.description: State-of-the-art facilities for baseball, soccer, tennis, and swimming with programs for all ages.
